# 二维差分

[AcWing-798-差分矩阵](https://www.acwing.com/solution/AcWing/content/2137/)

## 分析

![](/img/0005.bmp)

"影响"

应用：求子矩阵的和(静态)

## 实现

```cpp
// 修改: 单点、子矩阵, 查询: 子矩阵
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1010;
int n, m, q;
int a[N][N], d[N][N];
void insert(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int val)
{
    d[x1][y1] += val;
    d[x2 + 1][y1] -= val;
    d[x1][y2 + 1] -= val;
    d[x2 + 1][y2 + 1] += val;
}
int main()
{
    scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &q);
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i)
    {
        for(int j = 1; j <= m; ++ j)
        {
            scanf("%d", &a[i][j]);
            insert(i, j, i, j, a[i][j]);
        }
    }
    while(q --)
    {
        int x1, y1, x2, y2, val;
        scanf("%d%d%d%d%d", &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2, &val);
        insert(x1, y1, x2, y2, val);
    }
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i)
        for(int j = 1; j <= m; ++ j)
            d[i][j] = d[i][j] + d[i - 1][j] + d[i][j - 1] - d[i - 1][j - 1];
    for(int i = 1; i <= n; ++ i)
    {
        for(int j = 1; j <= m; ++ j)
            printf("%d ", d[i][j]);
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
```
